title: Enchanting Diamond & Emerald Kasulaperu Haaram - A Bridal Masterpiece
materials: 142.220 grams of high-purity Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features 1906 brilliant-cut diamonds totaling 9.38 carats
complemented by 2 vibrant rubies weighing 1.82 carats and 2 exquisite emeralds totaling 1.17 carats. Accentuated with 28 lustrous South Sea pearls totaling 95.31 carats.
features: This stunning Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary elegance. The broad, diamond-encrusted choker leads to a delicately cascading pattern, culminating in a pendant featuring a central emerald. Adorned with pearl drops, the design evokes a sense of opulence and grace. The meticulous setting of the diamonds enhances their brilliance, while the pearl drops add a touch of classic charm. The pendant features a similarly exquisite design, mirroring the intricacy of the main piece.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with pops of vibrant green (emeralds) and subtle red (rubies). The pearls add a soft
creating a rich and balanced color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its regal design makes it a cherished heirloom piece
description: This Diamond & Emerald Kasulaperu Haaram is a statement of exquisite craftsmanship and timeless beauty. The meticulous attention to detail, the high-quality materials, and the perfect blend of traditional and modern aesthetics make it a truly unique and desirable piece. Its Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, rubies and pearls is traditionally considered auspicious, making this Haaram not only beautiful but also a symbol of good fortune.
